articles.title: 3 Stock Market Mistakes Investors Should Avoid in 2025
articles.content: The article advises against making hasty investment decisions based on short-term market trends or political changes. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining a long-term investment strategy and avoiding the temptation to rotate in and out of sectors or companies that are temporarily underperforming.

articles.title: Is It Safe to Invest in the Stock Market Right Now? Here's What Warren Buffett Is Doing.
articles.content: The article discusses the current state of the stock market, which is considered overvalued by various experts. It examines Warren Buffett's approach, who is being cautious by selling some stocks, building a large cash stockpile, and being selective in his investments.

articles.title: Why Apple may be due for a stronger-than-usual iPhone update cycle
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) launches its iOS 18.2 update today. Some features in the update include ChatGPT integration into Siri and creating your own emojis. Creative Strategies CEO and Principal Analyst Ben Bajarin sits down with Asking for a Trend Anchor Josh Lipton to talk about how the new iOS update could impact iPhone demands and sales. "I think the super cycle term gets thrown around," says Bajarin. "I mean, I'm just still of the strong conviction that hardware changes, design changes drive those super cycles, not software. I do still think this is going to be a stronger-than-normal upgrade cycle only because we've known that this is an aging base." Bajarin went out to talk about the partnership between Apple and Sam Altman's OpenAI, the company that develops ChatGPT. "I think OpenAI, they're not Google. In no way, shape, or form are they brand-recognized or used as much as Google," says Bajarin. "So you could see the differences of this deal between a Google for search and ChatGPT and OpenAI for other features." Watch the video above to hear Bajarin's full take on Apple's iOS update. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here. This post was written by Daniel A. Nelson

articles.title: 10 Charts That Show The Unprecedented Scale Of The Magnificent 7 Bubble
articles.content: The Magnificent Seven stocks represent 33% of the entire S&P 500's market cap. Click here to read more about Mag 7 stocks through charts.

articles.title: Apple iOS 18.2 brings ChatGPT to iPhone users, OpenAI releases Sora
articles.content: Apple launches iOS 18.2 bringing Apple Intelligence features to new iPhone models, including ChatGPT integration, Genmoji, Image Playground, and Visual Intelligence. In other AI news, ChatGPT maker OpenAI unveils its AI video generation tool, Sora. Yahoo Finance Tech Editor Dan Howley joins Market Domination Host Julie Hyman to break down the latest in the tech space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

articles.title: Apple Stock Today: A Rise In Volatility Would Generate Profits In This Options Trade
articles.content: Apple is currently trading with a very low implied volatility (IV) rank.  This means options are cheap compared to the last 12 months.  Similar to this idea from a few weeks ago on Palantir Technologies, Apple stock could either continue its upward momentum, or suffer a pullback.

articles.title: Tracking George Soros's 13F Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
articles.content: George Soros' 13F portfolio value rose from $5.57B to $6.92B in Q3 2024, with 177 positions. Learn more about the trades and holdings in Q3.

articles.title: Steve Jobs taught Gap’s former CEO that micromanaging can be a good thing
articles.content: “I’m proud to be a micromanager for what a customer sees, feels, and hears,” Mickey Drexler said.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
articles.content: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to hyper-charge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth used by more than 92% of Fortune 500 companies. That growth has propelled OpenAI itself into becoming one of the most-hyped companies in recent memory. And its latest partnership with Apple for its upcoming generative AI offering, Apple Intelligence, has

articles.title: Mag 7 'not critical' for market success in 2025: Strategist
articles.content: While Bloomberg Intelligence is forecasting the Magnificent Seven's earnings growth — Meta Platforms (META), Microsoft (MSFT), Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Nvidia (NVDA), Tesla (TSLA) — to drop from 2024's 34% to 18% in 2025, will the group of tech stocks be as pivotal for the S&P 500 (^GSPC) in the new year? "They're obviously important for the market, but they're not critical for the market's success. And we see signs that earnings growth is set to broaden out as we head into 2025," J.P. Morgan Private Bank US Head of Investment Strategy Jake Manoukian tells Seana Smith and Brad Smith on the Morning Brief. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. ]This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.
